column5: Busy day again yesterday, off to Kitchener to pick up my son for Christmas & back to Teeswater to put a Presentation on for Teeswater Sacred Heart School Grade 3 to 8 were gathered in the Gym & a Power Point Presentation was put on with a few Stories & Lots of Questions asked, Students volunteered to walk through the Students & show them the Samples that were part of the Presentation. Tight Lines SBK School Presentation Pictures
